synopsis.text:
The anime introduces us to Marginal#4, a budding idol group that made their grand entrance at Pythagoras Production amidst snowfall on February 13. With a dream to send their love to the farthest corners of the galaxy, the group consists of Atom Kirihara, Rui Aiba, and the twin brothers L and R Nomura. The boys pour their hearts into their idol activities, aiming to reach the pinnacle of the entertainment industry, a feat previously achieved by their seniors, Lagrange Point.

Off-stage, the members of Marginal#4 lead ordinary lives as high school students, juggling the trials and tribulations of teenage life alongside their idol commitments. From securing a club room to filming commercials, their days are filled with a whirlwind of events that keep them on their toes. Despite the chaos, the boys strive to become the brightest stars in the idol world, captivating the hearts of their devoted fans, the Starclusters. Join Marginal#4 in their journey as they navigate the highs and lows of both their high school lives and their idol careers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
